thread.title: YouTuber creates bizarre Fifa 17 hack turning players into GIANTS - and it's hilarious
thread.title_full: YouTuber creates bizarre Fifa 17 hack turning players into GIANTS - and it's hilarious

author: Thomas Bristow
title: YouTuber creates bizarre Fifa 17 hack turning players into GIANTS - and it's hilarious
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A YouTuber has created a bizarre Fifa 17 hack which turns all the players into giants - and the results are incredibly funny. 
The vlogger, known as Finch, used the glitch in an offline draft so as not to affect anyone else's online experience. 
After picking out huge stars such as Neymar, Cristiano Ronaldo and Paul Pogba, Finch gets his game started - and the immediate results are hilarious. These players are HUGE. 
Finch leaves the referee and football the same size so you have some idea of scale. Giant bags of fun (Photo: Finch / Youtube) 
But as funny as it is, it does look incredibly difficult to play. 
Because the players are SO big, they naturally keep bouncing into each other and causing fouls. And despite their size, the goalkeepers are absolutely useless. Giant Ronaldo lines up a free-kick (Photo: Finch / Youtube) 
Still, would be fun to try. Watch full video below:
